entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Moncton Roméo LeBlanc Int'l Airport 12:00 PM ADT Tuesday 25 April 2023
Condition: Light Drizzle
Temperature: 5.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: 3.3°C
Wind: NNE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle. High 10 except 6 in onshore winds. POP 30%
